topic.title: эх господа, сеть под наблюдением! прощайте!
topic.body: эх господа, сеть под наблюдением! прощайте! T

1617189082_1Np1M1k3BSmiSHmqWrVAcxhvjLiVL.body: Ukraine is killing its own children! She will not be forgiven!
Dear friend drjudithshitberg, I love and respect Ukrainians, but I cannot put up with the current government of Ukraine!
